text:
Andy and I are going through movies to watch tonight, and I felt the need to say this again:

I am a ✨HUGE✨ Jamie Foxx fan, but I will never fucking forgive the Academy for ROBBING Don Cheadle of an Oscar for Hotel Rwanda. That performance profoundly affected me. He is unreal.
RT @AishaDaughter: I am watching hotel Rwanda. How are you going  take an African trauma and centre it around yourself?
I am watching hotel Rwanda. How are you going  take an African trauma and centre it around yourself?
America which turned it's back on Rwanda is now in danger of becoming Rwanda. Remember Hotel Rwanda?
@dunyevy Hotel Rwanda
